tool_description: Calculates and suggests optimal tempo settings based on musical style, time signature, and desired energy level.

musical_style.description: Musical style: ballad, pop, rock, jazz, electronic, classical

error_messages: Unknown musical style: Choose from ballad, pop, rock, jazz, electronic, classical
Invalid energy level: Choose low, medium, or high
Invalid time signature format: Use format like 4/4, 3/4, 6/8
usage: Specify musical style and energy level, optionally set time signature. Returns recommended tempo range and specific BPM.
